flavor: There was a certain schadenfreude about throwing away your credits.
stripped_text: Make a run on HQ. If successful, instead of accessing cards you may pay X credits to force the Corp to lose up to X credits, then take 1 tag.
text: Make a run on HQ. If successful, instead of accessing cards you may pay X[credit] to force the Corp to lose up to X[credit], then take 1 tag.
title: Vamp

flavor: It's easier to spend when it's not your money.
stripped_text: Place 16 credits from the bank on Liberated Account when it is installed. When there are no credits left on Liberated Account, trash it. click: Take 4 credits from Liberated Account.
text:
Place 16[credit] from the bank on Liberated Account when it is installed. When there are no credits left on Liberated Account, trash it.
[click]: Take 4[credit] from Liberated Account.
title: Liberated Account

flavor: T-minus 13 seconds. Leela had to work fast. She jacked in the mesa wire and activated the screen. 7 seconds. The internal SLD was still booting. 4 seconds. The interface flickered to life with an orange glow. 2 seconds. With a tap of a finger she was in.
stripped_text: Expose up to 2 cards.
text: Expose up to 2 cards.
title: Satellite Uplink

flavor: CyberSolutions' e3 line of implants trade strictly in muscle memory and autonomic responses, freeing the brain to focus entirely on cerebral tasks.
stripped_text: Whenever you break a subroutine on a piece of ice, you may pay 1 credit to break 1 subroutine on that ice. Errata from FAQ 3.0.1
text:
Whenever you break a subroutine on a piece of ice, you may pay 1[credit] to break 1 subroutine on that ice.
<errata>Errata from FAQ 3.0.1</errata>
title: e3 Feedback Implants

stripped_text: 1 recurring credit Use this credit during traces. Gain 1 credit whenever the Corp rezzes a piece of ice.
text:
1[recurring-credit]
Use this credit during traces.
Gain 1[credit] whenever the Corp rezzes a piece of ice.
title: Compromised Employee

flavor: When you're this good, it's hard not to grow a fan base.
stripped_text: Play only if you made a successful run on R&D, HQ, and Archives this turn. Add Notoriety to your score area as an agenda worth 1 agenda point.
text:
Play only if you made a successful run on R&D, HQ, and Archives this turn.
Add Notoriety to your score area as an agenda worth 1 agenda point.
title: Notoriety

flavor: "If your snowball gets big enough, you can make it into a snowman!" -Chaos Theory
stripped_text: 1 credit: Break barrier subroutine. 1 credit: +1 strength. Whenever you use Snowball to break a subroutine, it has +1 strength for the remainder of the run.
text: 1[credit]: Break barrier subroutine. 1[credit]: +1 strength. Whenever you use Snowball to break a subroutine, it has +1 strength for the remainder of the run.
title: Snowball

stripped_text: +1 mu, +1 link
text: +1[mu], +1[link]
title: Dyson Mem Chip

flavor: The key to the future lies in the past.
stripped_text: The trash cost of all installed cards is increased by 1.
text: The trash cost of all installed cards is increased by 1.
title: Encryption Protocol

stripped_text: The Runner may spend click to break any subroutine on Sherlock 1.0. Subroutine Trace 4 If successful, add 1 installed program to the top of the Runner's stack. Subroutine Trace 4 If successful, add 1 installed program to the top of the Runner's stack.
text:
The Runner may spend [click] to break any subroutine on Sherlock 1.0.
[subroutine] <trace>Trace 4</trace> If successful, add 1 installed program to the top of the Runner's stack.
[subroutine] <trace>Trace 4</trace> If successful, add 1 installed program to the top of the Runner's stack.
title: Sherlock 1.0

stripped_text: The Runner cannot run on remote servers. Ignore this ability until the end of the turn whenever the Runner runs on a central server.
text: The Runner cannot run on remote servers. Ignore this ability until the end of the turn whenever the Runner runs on a central server.
title: Jinteki: Replicating Perfection

stripped_text: If Fetal AI is accessed from R&D, the Runner must reveal it. When the Runner accesses Fetal AI, do 2 net damage. Ignore this ability if the Runner accesses Fetal AI from Archives. As an additional cost to steal Fetal AI, the Runner must pay 2 credits.
text:
If Fetal AI is accessed from R&D, the Runner must reveal it.
When the Runner accesses Fetal AI, do 2 net damage. Ignore this ability if the Runner accesses Fetal AI from Archives.
As an additional cost to steal Fetal AI, the Runner must pay 2[credit].
title: Fetal AI

stripped_text: Move up to 2 advancement tokens from a card to another installed card that can be advanced.
text: Move up to 2 advancement tokens from a card to another installed card that can be advanced.
title: Trick of Light

flavor: Peace and violence. Both must lead to the same place.
stripped_text: Subroutine For the remainder of this run, each piece of ice encountered except Sensei gains "Subroutine End the run" after all its other subroutines.
text: [subroutine] For the remainder of this run, each piece of ice encountered except Sensei gains "[subroutine] End the run" after all its other subroutines.
title: Sensei

flavor: Looking out for your interests since 1984.
stripped_text: Play only if the Runner is tagged. Give the Runner 2 tags.
text:
Play only if the Runner is tagged.
Give the Runner 2 tags.
title: Big Brother

flavor: Clones whisper of ChiLo as a promised land of freedom.
stripped_text: Whenever there is a successful trace during a run on this server, give the Runner 1 tag. Limit 1 region per server.
text: Whenever there is a successful trace during a run on this server, give the Runner 1 tag. Limit 1 region per server.
title: ChiLo City Grid

stripped_text: Play only if the Runner made a successful run during his or her last turn. Trace 2 If successful, trash 1 piece of hardware with an install cost equal to or less than the amount by which your trace strength exceeded the Runner's link strength.
text:
Play only if the Runner made a successful run during his or her last turn.
<trace>Trace 2</trace> If successful, trash 1 piece of hardware with an install cost equal to or less than the amount by which your trace strength exceeded the Runner's link strength.
title: Power Grid Overload

stripped_text: Whenever you install a piece of ice protecting this server, you may immediately rez it, lowering its rez cost by 3. Limit 1 region per server.
text: Whenever you install a piece of ice protecting this server, you may immediately rez it, lowering its rez cost by 3. Limit 1 region per server.
title: Amazon Industrial Zone

stripped_text: When you score Executive Retreat, place 1 agenda counter on it and shuffle HQ into R&D. click, hosted agenda counter: Draw 5 cards.
text: When you score Executive Retreat, place 1 agenda counter on it and shuffle HQ into R&D. [click], hosted agenda counter: Draw 5 cards.
title: Executive Retreat

flavor: No contract. Just a handshake and a fistful of C-6 high explosives.
stripped_text: Play only if the Runner is tagged. Trash up to 2 resources.
text:
Play only if the Runner is tagged.
Trash up to 2 resources.
title: Freelancer
